name: Boost.Math 1.88 Standalone
body:
## What's Changed
* Suppress unused parameter warnings by @Flamefire in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1223
* Update library version by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1224
* Fix clang warning when compiling with -ffast-math: use of infinity is undefined behavior due to the currently enabled floating-point options by @pps83 in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1222
* First batch changes double-fp-backend by @ckormanyos in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1226
* Change minimum clang version for -Wnan-infinity-disabled by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1225
* Query cyl_bessel_k for cpp_double_double by @ckormanyos in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1228
* Fix constexpr cmath floor of 1 returning 0 #1232 by @yousseflakhal in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1233
* Simplify the formula for the CDF of the Cauchy distribution. by @WarrenWeckesser in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1234
* Update gamma.hpp by @kenarab in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1236
* DOC: Update description of the Cauchy cdf and its complement. by @WarrenWeckesser in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1237
* Fix check for clang warning -Wnan-infinity-disabled by @pps83 in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1238
* Miscellaneous comment and doc corrections. by @WarrenWeckesser in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1239

## New Contributors
* @yousseflakhal made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1233

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/boostorg/math/compare/boost-1.87.0...boost-1.88.0

name: Boost.Math 1.87 Standalone
body:
## What's Changed
* Landau Integration testing by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1159
* Initial CUDA and SYCL support by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1161
* Add mapairy/holtsmark/saspoint5 distributions. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1163
* Batch number 2 of GPU support by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1162
* GPU batch 3 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1164
* GPU Batch 4 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1165
* Fix unused parameter warning by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1168
* GPU Batch 5 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1167
* Add proof of concept for NVRTC support by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1170
* Simplify and remove redundant code from Cauchy. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1174
* NVRTC Batch 2 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1172
* Remove now unused parameter by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1177
* Document logpdf, logcdf, and specializations by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1176
* NVRTC batch 3 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1178
* NVRTC Batch 4 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1179
* NVRTC Batch 5 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1180
* NVRTC Batch 6 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1182
* GPU Batch 6 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1184
* DOC: fix Cauchy CDF formula by @dschmitz89 in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1185
* GPU Batch 7 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1187
* GPU Batch 8 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1189
* Add support for modular build structure. by @grafikrobot in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1160
* GPU Batch 9 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1192
* Begin documenting GPU support by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1191
* Catch evaluation_error's in temme_method_2_ibeta_inverse by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1175
* Fix removed tgamma error handling path by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1195
* GPU Batch 10 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1193
* GPU Batch 11 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1196
* cmake: directly define project version by @lucascolley in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1199
* GPU Batch 12 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1200
* GPU Batch 13 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1201
* Add missing link library for compile tests by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1204
* Fix remez incl test by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1205
* Make sure we don't activate float128 use when explicitly disabled by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1207
* More fixes for path of compile tests by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1208
* CML: Add project to IDEs by @Flamefire in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1209
* Fix many, many obvious test bugs by @rdoeffinger in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1212
* Fix compile test CML and add CMake testing by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1213
* fix: define BOOST_MATH_NO_LONG_DOUBLE_MATH_FUNCTIONS for emscripten by @NickelWenzel in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1216
* Fix icx warning: explicit comparison with infinity in fast floating point mode with intel compiler by @pps83 in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1218

## New Contributors
* @dschmitz89 made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1185
* @lucascolley made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1199
* @rdoeffinger made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1212
* @NickelWenzel made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1216

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/boostorg/math/compare/boost-1.86.0...boost-1.87.0

name: Boost.Math 1.86 Standalone
body:
## What's Changed
* Don't use obsolete predef/checks/predef.jam B2 module. by @grafikrobot in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1122
* Improve reliability of codecov upload by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1124
* Update geometric.hpp by @kenarab in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1127
* Improve Heuman Lambda precision: by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1125
* Change skew normal quantile to use bracket_and_solve_root. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1123
* Correct ellint_1 logic for types with no infinity. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1130
* Correct spurious underflow issues in non-central beta and t (also eff… by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1134
* Correct float_next(+INF) and float_prior(-INF) by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1135
* Add guards to user configurable macro definitions by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1138
* Update CI by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1136
* Fix rational conditional by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1142
* Prevent passing denormals in calculation. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1141
* Make boost::math::ccmath::fminf and boost::math::ccmath::fminl constexpr by @quxflux in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1146
* Update Bessel functions at infinity. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1144
* Remove overload no longer required by multiprecision. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1147
* Add randomize_va_space to drone by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1149

## New Contributors
* @grafikrobot made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1122
* @kenarab made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1127
* @quxflux made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1146

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/boostorg/math/compare/boost-1.85.0...boost-1.86.0

name: Boost.Math 1.84 Standalone
body:
## What's Changed
* Use Dijkstra identities for 0(0th) Fibonacci convention by @ryanelandt in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1001
* update beta error messages and checks by @ryanelandt in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1003
* Update kolmogorov quantile newton ub to 1 by @ryanelandt in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1002
* only solve problems if have enough precision by @ryanelandt in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1004
* Update sanitizer images by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1011
* fix unused abterm1 compile warnings by @ryanelandt in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1014
* MSVC 14_0 stdndards and has-include corrections by @ckormanyos in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1017
* Eliminate unused parameter by @ckormanyos in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1019
* test fix for multiprecision 562 by @ryanelandt in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1015
* Fix inverse_discrete_quantile for large guess by @Yuhta in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1007
* Fix issue #1023 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1024
* Improve ibeta power term calculation in the Sterling case by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1025
* Avoid spurious overflow and divide by zero in ibeta. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1026
* Add clang-win to CI runs by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1030
* k should be size_t by @AtariDreams in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1031
* Adjust recursion when using the Bessel function approximation with la… by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1036
* Correct non-central-t series convergence bug. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1038
* ten should be a constexpr as a float by @AtariDreams in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1033
* Incorporate cast simplifications from PR880 by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1039
* has_denorm_now by @ryanelandt in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1029
* Fix clang-14 run in CI by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1041
* Qualify log1p calls. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1043
* Fix detection of ccmath usage in trunc by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1044
* Update/improve ccmath configuration. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1045
* Merge for 1.84 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1042
* Improve ccmath support detection. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1046
* Merge ccmath updates to master by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1047
* Update version history on master by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1054

## New Contributors
* @ryanelandt made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1001
* @Yuhta made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/1007

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/boostorg/math/compare/boost-1.83.0...boost-1.84.0

name: Boost.Math 1.83.0 Standalone
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix -Wmaybe-uninitialized in bessel jy series by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/967
* Fix rounding for non-representable numbers by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/968
* Add logcdf to distributions  by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/946
* Fix fisher_f mode by @maitbayev in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/976
* Fix for scipy issue 18302 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/977
* Fix case where b is a negative integer and z is also negative. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/983
* Minor PCHIP cleanup by @NAThompson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/984
* Fix for scipy issues 18506 and 18511 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/987
* Disable numeric_limits specialization for GCC-14 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/993
* Numerical evaluation of Fourier transform of Daubechies scaling funct… by @NAThompson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/921
* Small github actions updates by @sdarwin in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/995
* median_absolute_deviation bug fix for non-zero center by @rasmushenningsson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/997
* C++23 Floats by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/978

## New Contributors
* @maitbayev made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/976
* @rasmushenningsson made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/997

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/boostorg/math/compare/boost-1.82.0...boost-1.83.0

name: Boost.Math 1.82.0 Standalone
body:
## What's Changed
* Disable C6326: Potential comparison of a constant with another constant by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/857
* Improve the mention of Octonion in readme by @Bobini1 in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/859
* Use package manager for cygwin runs by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/862
* Fix warning 4146 and 4244 in ccmath by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/858
* Use 64-bit RNG for types that are 64 bits by @AtariDreams in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/865
* Assert when features which require C++17 are compiled for an earlier … by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/856
* Junk removal by @AtariDreams in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/863
* Remove thread limitation from GHA runner by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/874
* Fix typos by @bwignall in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/876
* Fix for issue #871 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/872
* Correct root finders in extreme cases. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/875
* Fix -Wimplicit-const-int-float-conversion by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/879
* Better error handling by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/883
* More and better handling of ibeta small args. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/884
* Fix warnings in special functions by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/864
* Correct tests to make them Multiprecision safe. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/887
* Fix for binomial distribution quantile edge case by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/890
* Fix for Non-Central T Distribution FE_INVALID by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/892
* Remove using std::cbrt to fix build on platforms which don't support it. by @NAThompson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/888
* Consolidate windows testing by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/895
* Use cfloat instead of float.h by @AtariDreams in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/899
* Fix tanh_sinh integration for edge case, by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/901
* Make integrators const correct. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/903
* Use `size_t` in `size_to_precision` by @Flamefire in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/907
* Require C++14 support by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/905
* Improve NAN handling in ccmath by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/912
* S390x testing by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/908
* libraries.json: fix typo by @drewrisinger in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/918
* Add deprecation notice to complex functions by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/917
* Remove most CI and just test arm64/drone. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/916
* Update tanh_sinh handling of boundaries. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/894
* Add additional architecture testing to drone by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/868
* Fix for Scipy Issue 16079. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/930
* Ignore warnings in distribution tests suite by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/933
* Downgrade condition numbers language requirement to C++14 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/934
* Fix for scipy issue 17916 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/939
* Enable GHA to kill in progress builds on new push by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/940
* Add Estrin's method for polynomial evaluation by @NAThompson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/932
* Fix hypergeometric for use with -fno-exceptions. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/950
* Fix for scipy issue 15101 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/949
* Turn debug symbols off for msvc-14.0. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/951
* Add cmake install by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/954
* Replace int with long long in nct pdf and cdf by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/955
* Update cxxstd field by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/958
* Fix for issue #959 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/960
* Fix ibeta_inv for very small p. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/962
* Improve error handling in non-central distributions. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/963

## New Contributors
* @Bobini1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/859
* @Flamefire made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/907
* @drewrisinger made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/918

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/boostorg/math/compare/boost-1.81.0...boost-1.82.0

name: Boost.Math 1.81.0 Standalone
body:
## What's Changed
* Constexpr next by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/789
* constexpr signbit by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/793
* Cleanup Warnings by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/795
* Fix unsafe bool usage by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/794
* More warning fixes by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/796
* Fix right endpoint derivative estimate error in cardinal cubic b spline by @sjrowlinson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/797
* Fixes for -Wzero-as-null-pointer-constant by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/798
* Corrected paths for cubic and quartic roots headers in doc by @RL-S in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/801
* Make sure ibeta_derivative triggers an underflow error when required. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/802
* Avoid overflow in intermediate bessel_ik computation by @mckib2 in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/805
* Add BOOST_NOINLINE to standalone config and apply to erf_inv_initiali… by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/809
* Fix for issue #810 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/811
* Add #include tests for the hypergeometric functions. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/812
* Fix for issue #800 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/813
* Update Readme by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/817
* Improve performance of the Complete Elliptic Integrals. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/815
* Improve ccmath signbit and copysign by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/819
* remove extra semicolon by @HDembinski in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/824
* Modernize exception specification by @apolukhin in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/822
* Correct 1F1[-n, -n, x] by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/832
* Fix Issue 833 by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/835
* Fix quartic roots when depressed cubic only has single real root by @NAThompson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/838
* BREAKING CHANGE: Correct definition of user_rounding_error, by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/836
* Fix Clang-15 warnings by @AtariDreams in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/831
* Specify seed in random tests. by @NAThompson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/839
* Fix bytes behavior by @AtariDreams in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/828
* short-circuit overflow protection for M1 Mac clang by @mckib2 in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/827
* Change looping over array to be unsigned by @AtariDreams in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/830
* Update deprecated workflow by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/840
* Fix spelling of "Ubuntu" by @AtariDreams in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/843
* Fix warnings in quadrature tests by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/844
* Fix for issue 845 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/846
* Fix for scipy issue 17146 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/847
* Drone minor config update by @sdarwin in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/850
* DOC: Fix a typo in the 'Standalone Usage' section. by @WarrenWeckesser in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/852
* Fix for issue #871 (#872) by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/897

## New Contributors
* @sjrowlinson made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/797
* @RL-S made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/801
* @mckib2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/805
* @HDembinski made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/824
* @apolukhin made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/822
* @sdarwin made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/850

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/boostorg/math/compare/boost-1.80.0...boost-1.81.0

name: Boost 1.80.0 Standalone
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix logic error in roots.hpp by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/777
* Minor 1F1 bug fixes. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/778
* Add further color map example by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/774
* Fix repeated name in example/policy_eg_1.cpp by @WarrenWeckesser in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/780
* Fix for issue 773 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/782
* Logpdf support by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/762
* Redeclaration of max_factorial value by @ckormanyos in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/784
* Chatterjee Correlation Coefficient by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/770
* Constexpr fma by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/734
* Set BOOST_NO_EXCEPTIONS and BOOST_NO_RTTI for GCC and math in standal… by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/786
* Bump minimum language standard to C++14 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/788
* Move all GCC-5/6 testing to drone. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/790
* Try and consolidate more Github tests. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/791
* Replace non-UTF-8 copyright character by @jwakely in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/792

## New Contributors
* @WarrenWeckesser made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/780
* @jwakely made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/792

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/boostorg/math/compare/boost-1.79.0...boost-1.80.0

name: Boost 1.79.0 Standalone
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix for beta link error by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/580
* Fix gini coefficient calculation. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/593
* Post-1.77 beta changes. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/661
* constexpr fpclassify by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/679
* I506 cstdfloat complex std by @ckormanyos in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/507
* Provide graceful failure for Bernoulli code on platforms with no atomics. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/684
* constexpr frexp by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/686
* constexpr ldexp by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/688
* Add abs specializations to ccmath by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/690
* constexpr div by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/691
* Constexpr logb and ilogb by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/692
* constexpr scalbn and scalbln by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/693
* constexpr floor and ceil by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/694
* constexpr trunc by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/695
* Fix cstdfloat_math_incl_test on ppc64le with ieee128 by @mscastanho in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/685
* constexpr modf by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/696
* constexpr round by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/697
* Expand the catmull-rom spline doc by @oleg-alexandrov in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/698
* constexpr fmod by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/699
* constexpr remainder by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/700
* constexpr copysign by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/701
* Disallow integral return types. by @NAThompson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/704
* Correct test for cpp_dec_float division. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/712
* TanhSinh: Correct m_inital_row_length in double precision case. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/711
* Fix low hanging fruit test failures on s390x. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/687
* Cubic roots by @NAThompson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/703
* Update limits used in erf/erfc approximations. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/713
* Improve tanh_sinh. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/714
* Remove unicode from comments and loosen up error tolerance. by @NAThompson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/716
* Constexpr hypot by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/721
* Fix tests for Apple M1 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/725
* Quartic roots. by @NAThompson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/718
* Fix and tests for issue #705 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/731
* Constexpr fdim by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/730
* Constexpr fmin and fmax by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/732
* Fix for linker errors from multiprecision changes. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/735
* Constexpr comparison functions by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/736
* Fix for issue #737 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/738
* Complete CI test with standalone mode by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/680
* Remove use of old-style casts from exp-sinh quadrature. by @NAThompson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/741
* Improving DE performance Part 2 by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/722
* Remove old-style casts. by @NAThompson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/743
* Remove C-Style Casts by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/744
* Begin to systematically remove direct use of lexical_cast in favour o… by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/742
* constexpr isunordered by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/745
* More C-Style Cast Removal by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/746
* Fix for #750 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/751
* Rework thread-safety logic in bernoulli_details.hpp. by @jzmaddock in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/753
* Add MSVC-2022 to CI Testing by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/720
* Color Maps by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/752
* Add GCC-5 to drone config by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/758
* Add class template argument deduction guides for distributions by @jamesfolberth in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/756
* Do not use an unguarded Newton iterate to polish roots; it goes crazy… by @NAThompson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/759
* Fix for issue 757. by @NAThompson in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/760
* Cygwin, FreeBSD and Long Doubles by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/729
* Fix for issue #764 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/765
* Implement logaddexp by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/763
* small correction to F distribution docs by @grlee77 in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/766

## New Contributors
* @oleg-alexandrov made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/698
* @jamesfolberth made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/756
* @grlee77 made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/math/pull/766

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/boostorg/math/compare/v1.77-standalone...boost-1.79.0

name: Boost 1.77 Standalone Release
body:
After some hammering on the beta release by many community contributors, we are proud to release the Boost Math 1.77-standalone. This is nearly identical to the 1.77 release, with a few bugs fixed in standalone mode.

A few highlights:

- Improved mode of the non-central χ² algorithm from @vindex10 
- Numerous fixes for the ARM platform from @StephanTLavavej 
- `constexpr` versions of many `cmath` functions, like `isnan`, `isfinite`, from @mborland 
- Bezier polynomials
- Bilinear uniform interpolation

name: Standalone Beta
body: This is the first standalone version of Boost.Math, corresponding roughly to Boost version 1.76. The main differences from the mainline version 1.76 are some diffs to make sure this works in isolation from the rest of Boost.
